x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.ipConfiguration) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.ipConfiguration))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.location) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.location))
!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.sku) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.sku))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.type) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.type))
